Title: Microsoft Intune: Managed device attestation for iOS/iPadOS and macOS device enrollment and ADE
Description:
Intune is bringing ACME and managed device attestation support for eligible Apple devices to GA. This includes device enrollment and ADE enrollments, including AC2. This applies to new enrollments with device enrollment (BYOD) and new enrollments with ADE or Apple Configurator tool.
GA date: March CY2026
